text: Usaile akasaharula'i stambha bina srsti garyo jasto timile dekhdachau, ra usale dharatima pahada sthapita garidiyo, taki yasale timila'i nahalla'ide'os, ra tyasama hareka prakaraka janavaraharu phaila'idiyo, ra hamile akasabata pani barsa'era prthvima hareka kisimaka sundara jod'aharu utpadana garyaum
